name: GOAL! (itch)
description:
Here is a game I created specifically for the 2-Button Jam.  I plan to add more features to it but I won't have time to implement them before the submissions close.

Welcome to GOAL!, a block breaker meets Pong style of game.

Press the DOWN ARROW to kickoff/reset the screen after a goal.

Use the DOWN and UP ARROWS to control your character.

If the ball gets stuck in a loop or slows to a halt, hold the UP and DOWN ARROW keys  at the same time for 3ish seconds to reset the ball.   Hit the DOWN ARROW to kickoff again.  

First to 11 wins.  Enjoy!
